row.process: :SET &UC4RB_RET#=CREATE_OBJECT("VARA","UC4_RV.WI_CMD.RET_STR2VAR","") :SET &KEY#=0 :SET &UC4RB_POS#=STR_FIND(&UC4RB_TEXT#,",") :WHILE &UC4RB_POS# <> 0 : SET &UC4RB_POS#=SUB(&UC4RB_POS#,1) : SET &UC4RB_FIRST#=SUBSTR(&UC4RB_TEXT#,1,&UC4RB_POS#) : SET &UC4RB_POS#=ADD(&UC4RB_POS#,2) : SET &UC4RB_TEXT#=SUBSTR(&UC4RB_TEXT#,&UC4RB_POS#) : PUT_VAR UC4_RV.WI_CMD.RET_STR2VAR,&KEY#,&UC4RB_FIRST# : SET &KEY#=ADD(&KEY#,1) : SET &UC4RB_POS#=STR_FIND(&UC4RB_TEXT#,",") :ENDWHILE :PUT_VAR UC4_RV.WI_CMD.RET_STR2VAR,&KEY#,&UC4RB_TEXT#
